about_the_game:
You are trapped in an endless corridor, where eerie events keep unfolding, as if something is trying to stop you from escaping. Pay close attention to each floor's details: if you notice anything unusual, go upstairs; otherwise, proceed downstairs. The only way to escape is to reach the first floor.

Gameplay:

This is a walking simulator with elements of horror and suspense.
If you find an anomaly, go upstairs; otherwise, proceed downstairs.
If you make a wrong choice, you'll be sent back to the 18th floor (after reaching the 10th floor, you will only be sent back to the 10th floor). Reach the 1st floor to end.
Some anomalies can only be detected through sound, so it's recommended to wear headphones for the best experience.
There are 44 anomalies in total, some of which are very well hidden and will test your observation skills.
Once you've found all the anomalies, the truth will be revealed.

Controls:

WASD: Move
Shift: Run
Right Mouse Button: Zoom In
Esc: Menu

content_descriptors.notes: In the game, posters of women wearing revealing clothing will appear, and in some scenes, a large amount of blood will appear.
